overview:
Cem Kozinoglu, Co-Founder of Boomset.com, serves as the chief technical officer responsible for building&developing the architecture, design & flow, security, operational integrity, system support and maintenance of Boomset.com to operate in Enterprise level.

Before founding Boomset, Cem begun his first project around nine, building one of the very first search engines of Turkey (Turkvista) around thirteen with over millions of visitors/queries per month, including a mobile search engine platform, published in major written and visual media, followed by one of the very first domain forwarding systems of Turkish Internet community (Tr8.net). Graduating from UMass-Amherst as a Computer Science major he joined in to Fast Search & Transfer, a Norwegian start-up based in Boston, MA. After moving to NYC office and working over two years in major NYC accounts, Microsoft acquired Fast Search & Transfer and Cem took a different route and created one of the top free iPhone apps of Turkish iTunes store which along with many other reasons lead him quit MSFT and here he is now.
